TextView.android:text: Sample Diet Chart Breakfast: 1 cup of boiled vegetables with 2 glasses of water. Brunch: 1/2 bowl of boiled red kidney beans or rajma with a sliced tomato and 2 glasses of water. Lunch: 1 bowl of mixed vegetable soup and 1 cup of cooked brown rice with 2 glasses of water. Afternoon Snack: 1 apple or pear and a glass of water. Evening Snack: 1 bowl of sprouts with a glass of water. Dinner: A bowl of boiled mixed vegetables and a glass of water.
